name: Devil Diver
description:
Enter the Dungeon as the traitor cultist, kill your old allies to power the portal and descend deeper and deeper! 

But be warned! Banished being that you are, your life source serves as your mana pool.

v1.04 FIXES AIM AT LAST FINALLY 1.03 Removes mega sound of death (literally) button

Don't ask

1.02 Fixes the aim  1.01 Hotfixes the sound and allows you to respawn Controls:  Move: WASD Left mouse: Shoot, aim with cursor SHIFT: Run Interaction: F And again! You spend health every time you use abilities! Spend it wisely...

Devil Diver is an isometric roguelike where your abilities cost health. The dungeons are randomly generated and to get to the next one you have to kill enough enemies to enter the portal. 

The game sports original graphics, sound and music!

Made for Ludum Dare 48!
